shortdesc.ph: Adjusts the playback volume of the music file.
Adjusts the playback volume of the music file.
Adjusts the playback volume of the music file.
Adjusts the playback volume of the music file.

section.p: This method adjusts the playback volume of the mixed music file on both the local and remote ends.
This method adjusts the playback volume of the mixed music file on both local and remote sides.
This method adjusts the playback volume of the mixed music file for both local and remote playback.
This method adjusts the playback volume of the mixed music file on both the local and remote ends.
section.note: Calling this method does not affect the playback volume of sound effect files set by the method.
Calling this method does not affect the playback volume of sound effects set in the method.
Calling this method does not affect the playback volume of sound effects set via the method.
Calling this method does not affect the playback volume of sound effects set by the method.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You must call this method after .
You need to call this method after .
This method must be called after .

plentry.pd: The volume range of the music file is 0~100. 100 (default) is the original file volume.
The volume range of the music file is 0~100. 100 (default) is the original file volume.
Volume range of the music file is 0~100. 100 (default) is the original file volume.
The volume of the music file. The range is [0,100]. 100 (default) represents the original volume of the file.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
